body_html:
supervised_session.SupervisedSession had that restriction. SuperviseSession was removed and replaced with a MonitoredSession. MonitoredSession don't have this restriction.

FYI, we don't export Supervised or Monitored session via init since we're still working on it's interface/implementation. It will be exported via init when we think it's ready for a global use.
body_text:
supervised_session.SupervisedSession had that restriction. SuperviseSession was removed and replaced with a MonitoredSession. MonitoredSession don't have this restriction.
FYI, we don't export Supervised or Monitored session via init since we're still working on it's interface/implementation. It will be exported via init when we think it's ready for a global use.
body:
supervised_session.SupervisedSession had that restriction. SuperviseSession was removed and replaced with a MonitoredSession. MonitoredSession don't have this restriction.

FYI, we don't export Supervised or Monitored session via **init** since we're still working on it's interface/implementation. It will be exported via **init** when we think it's ready for a global use.
